title: Facebook is so slow on Firefox
content: Hey every time i go to Facebook it keeps going super slow and continues to display the prompt bar where it says this page is slowing your browser down. to speed up your browser stop this page.... well its every single page. and this is happening to me on a couple of computers. I have cleared cache and cookies. I've turned off enhanced tracking. I've also tried opening in a private window and still the same thing.
creator: todd.copen

title: 115.0.3 on macOS 13.5 failing to complete authentication with FIDO2 Security Key
content:
I've been attempting to use FIDO2 w/ PIN support to log into Okta. This occurs with a pre-registered security key (Yubikey 5C NFC on most recent firmware) that has a PIN already configured. This key works on all other browsers and devices without trouble. Firefox is unresponsive to Yubikey interaction after the notice "Touch your security key to continue with <company>.okta.com" and will eventually time out if I do not cancel.

On the other hand, I can register a new security key on Okta through Firefox on this device. When I go through the registration workflow, Firefox is responsive to all interactions, allowing me to enter my PIN and complete registration.

I have been able to replicate this issue on other computers and with a different user / security key.
creator: clinton.campbell

title: Firefox drop down menu on an imac
content: Firefox is up to date. Preferences is not a choice under the Firefox drop down menu. What do I do on an imac to have preferences appear in the drop down menu?
creator: judithknee

title: Firefox Mozilla Online Search Engine not working
content: I have repeatedly been denied access to searched information. The latest failed attempt was my search for the Stockton Police Department's contact number. The search option comes up only to get a cannot access type error. This is not the first time. After years with Firefox I am considering switching providers
creator: LadyNRedjag

title: Denied access to searches i.e. police departments
content:
Locking this thread.
Please continue here: [/questions/1419623]
I want to know why Firefox has repeatedly denied me access to searches? In particular a search as critical as a city police department contact information!
creator: LadyNRedjag
